results.title: Antineoplastic Activity of an Old Natural Antidiabetic Biguanide on the Human Thyroid Carcinoma Cell Line.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ significantly decreased the viability of the @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_cancer_medullary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536914 @@@MTC@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Nozhat Z, Zarkesh M, Baldini E, Mohammadi-Yeganeh S, Azizi F, Hedayati M. Antineoplastic Activity of an Old Natural Antidiabetic Biguanide on the Human Thyroid Carcinoma Cell Line. Anticancer Agents Med Chem. 2022;22(4):713-720. PMID: 33461474

results.title: Metformin inhibits growth and decreases resistance to anoikis in medullary thyroid cancer cells.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ inhibits growth and decreases resistance to anoikis in @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_cancer_medullary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536914 @@@medullary thyroid cancer@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Klubo-Gwiezdzinska J, Jensen K, Costello J, Patel A, Hoperia V, Bauer A, Burman KD, Wartofsky L, Vasko V. Metformin inhibits growth and decreases resistance to anoikis in medullary thyroid cancer cells. Endocr Relat Cancer. 2012 Jun;19(3):447-56. PMID: 22389381

results.title: Metformin and thyroid: an update.
results.text_hl: Concerning @DISEASE_Thyroid_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D013964 @@@thyroid cancer@@@, there is experimental evidence showing antimitogenic properties of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in differentiated and @<m>DISEASE_Thyroid_cancer_medullary</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536914 @@@medullary thyroid cancer@@@ cells.

citations.NLM: Pappa T, Alevizaki M. Metformin and thyroid: an update. Eur Thyroid J. 2013 Mar;2(1):22-8. PMID: 24783035
